title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: professor was examining the broken machinery.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I have a plan!" suddenly cried Mark.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What is it?" asked Mr. Henderson.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Can't we bore a hole in the tank, insert a small faucet or tap, and let
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the gas out that way gradually?" asked the boy. "When we get down we can
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: rescue those in danger of fire, and, later, can repair the break."
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The very thing!" exclaimed Mr. Henderson. "I never thought of that!
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Here, Washington! Bring me a drill, and a small stop-cock!"
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The drill was obtained from the engine room. Working rapidly Mr.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Henderson bored a hole in the lower part of the holder. As soon as the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: metal was penetrated the gas, which was under considerable pressure,
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: rushed from the tank with a hissing sound. At once the _Mermaid_ began
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to settle rapidly.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But the professor was prepared for this. He thrust the end of the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: stop-cock into the hole. It was screwed fast and the valve turned. This
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: stopped the flow of gas and checked the descent of the ship. Then, by
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: opening the tap the vapor was allowed to escape gradually, bringing the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: _Flying Mermaid_ gently to the water.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: As the adventurers approached they could see that the vessel was now a
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mass of flames. The wind was driving the fire toward the forecastle, and
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the crew had sought refuge aft. But this expedient could not last long,
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: for, already the tongues of fire were licking the sides of the craft and
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: coming nearer and nearer the seemingly doomed men. The vessel was a
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: large one, and heavily laden.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: As those in peril caught sight of the _Mermaid_ settling down into the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: water, apparently from the clouds, their fears gave place to
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: astonishment. So great was this that they ceased their cries of terror.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Then, as they saw that the strange craft navigated the ocean, for the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: engines were started aboard the _Mermaid_, they began to call for help.

text: THE FLYING MERMAID DISABLED
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We'll save you!" shouted Mr. Henderson, who was on the deck, while Mark
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was steering the craft. "Hold on a few minutes longer and we'll be
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: alongside!"
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "They're real! They're real!" some of those aboard the burning ship
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: could be heard to shout. Evidently more than one of them had taken the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: _Mermaid_ for a delusion of their fear-crazed brain.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "They are real persons!" they called again and again. "They are coming
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to save us!"
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mr. Henderson ran his ship as near the burning craft as he dared. Then
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: he called to the crew to leap into the water and swim to him. He, with
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Washington, Jack, Bill and Tom, stood ready to haul aboard any who were
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: too weak to help themselves.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: In a few minutes all of those left alive on the sailing vessel--fourteen
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: in all--had come safely aboard the _Mermaid_. The ship was now
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: completely enveloped in flames.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Are there any more left on her?" asked Mr. Henderson of one who
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: appeared to be a mate of the burning craft.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Not a soul!" was the answer. "The captain and ten men perished in the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: flames. The fire broke out a week ago in the lower hold. We fought it as
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: well as we could but it got the best of us. Then it suddenly broke
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: through the decks, almost like an explosion, a little while ago, and the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: captain and others were lost, and so were our small boats. We managed to
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: get aft but were about to give up when you appeared."
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What ship is it and where are you from?"
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "The _Good Hope_, laden with logwood, hides, jute and other materials
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: from South America," the mate answered. "We were bound for New York."
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "It is more like the _Last Hope_ instead of the _Good Hope_," observed
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mr. Henderson in a quiet voice, as he saw the flames mount higher and
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: higher over the ship. A few seconds later the craft seemed rent by an
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: internal explosion. It appeared to break in two parts, and, amid a
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: shower of sparks and a cloud of black smoke, the vessel sank under the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: water and was seen no more.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The rescued men turned to behold the final end of their ship. They
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: betrayed no particular emotion, and some of them even laughed, which the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: professor thought, at the time, was rather strange. But there was little
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: opportunity for speculation. The men were in a sad plight. Few of them
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had more than the clothes they stood in, though each one wore about his
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: waist a belt, and all of them seemed to guard the leather circlets
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: jealously.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The professor and his crew were soon busy supplying remedies for burns,
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: since several of the men were seared by the flames. Then, as it was
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: learned they had eaten nothing for many hours, it having been impossible
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: to use the galley, a meal was prepared and the survivors of the wreck
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: were well fed.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The hunger of the newcomers having been appeased, they showed much
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: curiosity over the strange craft that had so opportunely come to their
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: rescue. Most of the sailors were ignorant men, and the professor had
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: little fear of them learning anything concerning his secrets. He
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: explained briefly about the _Mermaid_, but said nothing of whither she
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was bound.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The addition of fourteen men to the rather small accommodations of the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: _Mermaid_ was a serious matter to consider. The ship was able to hold
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: them all, and even to sail through the air with them, since Mr.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Henderson had provided an excess of power. But it was going to be a
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: problem to feed so many, and still save enough provisions for the long
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: voyage which lay ahead.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: However, Mr. Henderson felt his first duty to be toward his fellowmen,
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: even if his voyage must be delayed, or given up for a time, while he got
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: more provisions. There would be no sleeping quarters for the sailors,
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: but when this was explained to them they cheerfully said they would
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: sleep on deck if necessary. In fact some of them had to, but as the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: weather was warm and clear this was no hardship. A few found quarters in
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the engine room and other apartments of the _Mermaid_.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Finding, after an examination, that his ship was in good order save for
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the broken gas apparatus, Mr. Henderson gave orders to proceed along the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: surface of the ocean. The sailors wanted to see how it felt to mount
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: into the air, but Mr. Henderson, refused to attempt a flight until he
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had made complete repairs, and this would take a day or more.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: At this there appeared to be some discontent among the survivors, and
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: they muttered to each other as they stood in a group on deck. But the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: professor and his assistants were too busy with their preparations for
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: fixing the break to notice this.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: While the men were gathered in a knot near the after part of the small
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: deck, the mate separated from them, and, coming close to where Mark was
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: standing, unscrewing some of the broken parts of the pipe said, in a low
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: voice.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Tell the captain to watch out."
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "What do you mean?" asked Mark quickly.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Hush! Not so loud!" the mate exclaimed. "If the men hear me talking to
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: you, or see me, they may kill me. Tell the captain to look out; that's
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: all. Be on guard, and watch the engine room carefully."
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "But why--?" Mark began, when, turning suddenly, the mate left him. It
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was well he did so, for, at that instant, one of the sailors, who had
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: observed the two conversing, strolled in their direction.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Much alarmed, Mark sought Mr. Henderson and told him what he had heard.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I suppose the fire may have turned the poor man's head," the scientist
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: said. "I wonder if he thinks the men I rescued would mutiny and take
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: possession of my ship? If they did they would not know how to work it,
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: so what good would it do?"
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Hadn't we better look out?" asked Mark.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "I'm not afraid," replied the professor. "I will be too busy the next
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: few days, repairing the break, to think of anything else. Besides, what
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: would they want to harm us for? Didn't we save their lives?"
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Seeing the scientist placed no faith in what the mate had said, Mark
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: went back to his task.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: It soon became too dark to work, and it was decided, after supper, to
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: halt the ship until morning as it would be less risky.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark did not sleep well, his dreams being disturbed by visions of
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: pirates and black flags. But morning came and nothing had developed. The
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: men seemed to recover their spirits with daybreak, and most of the crew,
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: after breakfast, greeted Mr. Henderson pleasantly, and asked to be
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: allowed to help fix the ship.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: It took the skilled labor of the professor, Washington and the boys to
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mend the break, and, even at that, it was four days in the repairing.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: But at last the final bolt was in place, and the _Mermaid_ was able to
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: resume her trips through the air.
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "We will rise the first thing in the morning," said the professor to
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Mark and Jack that night. "I am anxious to see how the ship behaves with
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a big load aboard."

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: over. At first he thought it was Jack, and sleepily muttered that he
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

text: wanted to be let alone.

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

text: This is one of the last stories penned by that prince of all juvenile
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: writers, Horatio Alger, Jr., and is one of his best. It describes the
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: adventures of a youth brought up in the country by an old hermit. When
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the hermit dies the boy obtains work at a nearby hotel, and later on
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: drifts to the city and obtains a position in another hotel. There is a
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mystery concerning the lad's identity and likewise the disappearance of
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: a certain blue box, but in the end all terminates satisfactorily.

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth

text: country before, and his eyes were opened to a new world. Then the youth
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: was sent to a boarding school, where he made his way to the front amid
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: many difficulties. Mr. Alger's charm as a juvenile writer is so well
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: known it is needless to mention it here, and this story is in his best
title: Five Thousand Miles Underground; Or, the Mystery of the Centre of the Earth
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: vein.
